name: GLOS: Graphic Library in Open Source
short_description: This university project attempts to rebuild a limited OpenGL subset from scratch in Common Lisp. Speed was an important concern in 1999: now it should run very fast. No texture support.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
